Name: Sleep
About the game: Sleep - is an indie horror where the main character sees a new nightmare in which she has never been and she has to understand what is the cause of this nightmare. Jill Spencer is a journalist for a little-known newspaper, Newsday, but the job suits her. The girl has problems with sleep, she often sees explicit dreams in which she lives a different life. With this problem, she can not fight as she did not try, and in order to Wake up, she has to watch the dream until the end. For this reason, the girl has problems at work. Once friends asked her to look after their house while they were away. From that moment on, she was lost in reality. You have to finish the story by reaching the end and understand what is happening and who is behind everything. Death in a dream is not an option, since the situation may not be a dream, but death in a dream will not affect it very well. Nice graphics Interesting plot Genre Indie horror Psychedelia First person Attention The game has screeners and creepy sounds. People with a weak heart or suffering from panic attacks, epilepsy, etc.) do not recommend playing this game and even try it. !!! Attention In This Game Very Bad English !!!
